column1: Baby Barnaby's////Baby Barnaby's is the sole reason why I look forward to Sunday Brunch. My friend's and I go just about every Sunday. The food is great and the atmosphere is too. My usual dish is the steak(med rare of course) and eggs. Try it with the potatoes
column3: and biscuits. I also have the chicken fried steak and eggs as well. The staff is very friendly
column5: fresh coffee. It's pretty inexpensive as well. Our tab averages $45.00 for a group of 5.
